code: export var FETCH_ORDER_HISTORY="FETCH_ORDER_HISTORY";export var fetchOrdersHistoryAction=function fetchOrdersHistoryAction(history){return{type:"FETCH_ORDER_HISTORY",payload:history};};export var FETCH_PRODUCT_IN_CART="FETCH_PRODUCT_IN_CART";export var fetchProductsInCartAction=function fetchProductsInCartAction(products){return{type:"FETCH_PRODUCT_IN_CART",payload:products};};export var FETCH_PRODUCT_IN_LIKE="FETCH_PRODUCT_IN_LIKE";export var fetchProductsInLikeAction=function fetchProductsInLikeAction(products){return{type:"FETCH_PRODUCT_IN_LIKE",payload:products};};export var SIGN_IN="SIGN_IN";export var signInAction=function signInAction(userState){return{type:"SIGN_IN",payload:{isSignedIn:true,role:userState.role,uid:userState.uid,username:userState.username}};};export var SIGN_OUT="SIGN_OUT";export var signOutAction=function signOutAction(){return{type:"SIGN_OUT",payload:null};};
